titleStmt.title: Honos & onus levitarum. Or, tithes vindicated to the presbyters of the gospel in a sermon preached at an archidiaconall visitation at Marleborough, in the diocese of Sarum, on the 10. of October. 1636. By B.P.
Historie of tithes, or tithes vindicated
titleStmt.author: Parsons, Bartholomew, 1574-1642.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Turner, for William Webb,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
